titleInfo.title: The reminiscences of John D. Rockefeller.
The world's work; Random reminiscences of men and events; The outlook; The American magazine.

mods.note: 11 articles from: The world's work, September 1908-April 1909, The outlook, October, 1907, and The American magazine, December 1907.
mods.abstract: Rockefeller, John D. Some random reminiscences of men and events. (6 articles); Doubleday, F.N. Some impressions of John D. Rockefeller; Howland, Harold J. Standard Oil; Keys, C.M. The Standard Oil Company; Keys, C.M. How the Standard Oil Company does its business; Tarbell, Ida M. Roosevelt vs. Rockefeller.
